chinaya saha shri lankawa mithrashili asalwasi ratawal wana athara, shri lankawe wathawaranaya pilibadawa chinaya samipa awadhanayen pasuwana bawath ohu kiya sitiya.hitapu janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha nawa agramathyawaraya lesa path kirimen anathuruwa shri lankawe china thanapathi chen shuyewan ohu hamuwuye china janadhipathi shi jinpinge suba pathum da samangin.in anathuruwa ohu hitapu agramathya ranil wikramasinha da muna gasuna.
widyagnyayan kiyanne sathwa ha shaka wishesha atharin atham eewa wiyapath nowi wuwada thawaduratath digu kalayak jiwath wana bawayi.
